query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `documentSummaries` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `documentId` int NOT NULL,
  `sectionId` int,
  `summaryLevel` enum('document','section','chunk') NOT NULL,
  `summaryStyle` varchar(32) DEFAULT 'concise',
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `wordCount` int,
  `compressionRatio` int,
  `modelUsed` varchar(128),
  `preserveCitations` enum('true','false') DEFAULT 'false',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `documentSummaries_documentId_idx` (`documentId`),
  KEY `documentSummaries_sectionId_idx` (`sectionId`),
  CONSTRAINT `documentSummaries_documentId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`documentId`) REFERENCES `documents` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `documentSummaries_sectionId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`sectionId`) REFERENCES `documentSections` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
command:

  `preserveCitations` enum('true','false') DEFAULT 'false',

  CONSTRAINT `documentSummaries_documentId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`documentId`) REFERENCES `documents` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `documentSummaries_sectionId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`sectionId`) REFERENCES `documentSections` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
